Title: Authorizes the town of New Berlin, county of Chenango, to reduce the maximum speed limit along a West Shore Road in such town to fifteen miles per hour
Summary: Authorizes the town of New Berlin, county of Chenango, to reduce the maximum speed limit along West Shore Road in such town to 15 miles per hour.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the town of New Berlin, county of Chenango, to reduce the maximum speed limit along a West Shore Road in such town to 15 miles per hour
